# OffGrid Filters
> Expert water filter reviews and buying guides for every need and budget.

## About
OffGrid Filters is an independent authority site dedicated to testing, comparing, and reviewing water filtration products. We cover everything from countertop RO systems to survival filter straws, helping readers find the right water filter for their home, outdoor adventures, or emergency preparedness needs.
